remarks: Find a second point on a line.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Oct-2019.)
statement:
tglnpt2.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglnpt2.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglnpt2.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglnpt2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglnpt2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ran L ) $.
tglnpt2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
tglnpt2 $p |- ( ph -> E. y e. A X =/= y ) $.
$d A y $.
$d X y $.
